email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well.

We have a prompt vessel available for your shipment of steel coils from Rotterdam to Houston. The vessel, MV OCEAN HORIZON, is currently open and can accommodate your cargo size of 15,000 MT. The initial freight quote is USD 45/MT, FOB terms.

Laycan is 15-20 October 2023. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the prompt offer. USD 45/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you sharpen the rate to around USD 40/MT? Also, could you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Looking forward to your response.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for your feedback. I can adjust the rate to USD 42/MT, which is the best I can offer at this time. The MV OCEAN HORIZON has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225 meters.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 42/MT is acceptable. Can you confirm the laycan and provide details on the demurrage rate?

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Great! The laycan remains 15-20 October 2023. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata.

I will send over the recap shortly.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Perfect. Please proceed with the recap. Looking forward to finalizing this shipment.

Best,
Emily
